articles.author: Julia Payne, Alan Charlish
articles.title: Poland, Hungary, Slovakia to continue own bans on Ukraine grains - Reuters
articles.description: Poland, Slovakia and Hungary announced their own restrictions on Ukrainian grain imports on Friday after the European Commission decided not to extend its ban on imports into Ukraine's five EU neighbours.
articles.content: BRUSSELS/WARSAW, Sept 15 (Reuters) - Poland, Slovakia and Hungary announced their own restrictions on Ukrainian grain imports on Friday after the European Commission decided not to extend its ban on … [+5629 chars]

articles.title: Apple moves to defuse French iPhone 12 row as EU scrutiny steps up - Reuters
articles.description: Apple (AAPL.O) pledged on Friday to update software on iPhone 12s in France to settle a row over radiation levels, but concerns in other European countries signalled it may have to…
